overview: The much-loved Lesbian Seductions series returns with more tales of unconventional love and desire. Watch as these nubile, young girls give in to their curiosities about older women, letting them take control of their bodies. With experience and wisdom guiding their hands and tongues, Magdalene St. Michaels, Cherie DeVille, Brenda James, and more return to pleasure girls half their age.
tagline: The revealing twisted road from desire to pursuit and surrender!
title: Lesbian Seductions: Older/Younger 51
